oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allison, Hugh, 1835 August 26
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Hugh Allison, dated August 26th, 1835. Illustrates the first page of the document. The verso cites: “Recorded Book No. 10, Pages 548 & 9,” for probate to the Davidson County Court. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allison family
